0: Just to note the swimming pool is currently covered and out of order and does not look like it will be ready anytime soon
it is locationThey are remodeling and there was no pool
To top everything off they asked if we wanted ear plugs because they would be working on the pool at 8 am
Only down side was the pool being closed for renovations and one elevator out of service for an upgrade which made the wait a bit longer
The pool was closed and depending on where your room was you had a long walk to the gym as the elevators on the south side did not allow access
The pool was being renovated but I was able to use another pool at a neighbouring hotel
We did not use the facilities outside of our room so not sure about the pool or gym
However the staff drove us to the Hilton across the street to use their pool
Hotel is under renovation so even though website says pool opening Dec 2015 it is now end of February and there is no pool or workout room
1: If you love hotel pools stay at this hotel
I uploaded a number of photos as the management photos do not display this pools beauty
They build this king suit on main floor which feel more as a basementhotel is build on a slope and you have view of pool and side wall in upscale 300 suit
Also after we checked out we requested and were given access to the pool and patio to kill time until the shuttle
There is a pool that we went down to see and it is a large pool and very nice
It really is quite unfortunate because except for the pool and sauna the hotel was very nice
The basketball court offered an alternative to just swimming for the kids
Pretty average for a Hilton Location pool sauna
Pool towels were a good size not the small ones at other hotels
Because we had a late flight we found we could store our luggage and relax around the pool for the afternoon
3: Gym pool and squash court were available but not used this time around
The basketball court had water dripping on the floor and the stairs to the pool were needing some TLC
It would have been nice to relax in a jacuzi spa and the lobby under renovations was a draw back
No soap in sauna of pool
The hotel was very bare bones basic with a view of the parking lot indoor pool
My son and I swam and played basketball for a couple of hours we had a blast it is a full half court with regulation net in an old converted racquetball court ball court we think
Pool is very un deep not really suitable for real swimming
The only thing missing is a hot tub as the pool was quite cold
Pool was freezing and no hot tub
